import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import defaultImage from './default.jpeg' import css from './Profile.module.css'; import { Card, Description, Avatar, UserName, Tag, Location, Stats } from './Profile.styled' const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar = defaultImage, stats, }) => { return ( {username} {tag} {location}
  • Folowers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
    • ) } Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string, tag: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string, avatar: PropTypes.string, stats: PropTypes.shape({ followers: PropTypes.number, views: PropTypes.number, likes: PropTypes.number, } ), } export default Profile
